visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing market share distribution of passenger auto registrations using a donut-style technique with innerSize set to 75%
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains 4 categorical dimensions representing vehicle types (EV, Hybrids, Diesel, Petrol) with percentage market shares. Original data from cleantechnica demonstrates high validity through explicit sourcing and sum validation (Σ=100%). The donut chart emphasizes part-to-whole relationships while conserving data-ink through removed central area. Cairo's principles are applied through: 1) Pre-attentive color differentiation 2) Legend/text alignment reducing eye travel 3) Percentage formatting enabling magnitude comparisons. Statistical anchors include exact proportional splits (EV dominance at 68.1%) and calculated residual fossil fuel segment (20.9%). Tooltip reinforcement of absolute percentages adheres to Tufte's data-density recommendations.
